entry.content: æ—¶é’Ÿç³»ç»ŸçŸ¥è¯†æ€»ç»“ STM32 æœ‰5ä¸ªæ—¶é’Ÿæº:HSIã€HSEã€LSIã€LSEã€PLLã€‚ HSIæ˜¯é«˜é€Ÿå†…éƒ¨æ—¶é’Ÿï¼ŒRCæŒ¯è¡å™¨ï¼Œé¢‘çŽ‡ä¸º8MHzï¼Œç²¾åº¦ä¸é«˜ã€‚ HSEæ˜¯é«˜é€Ÿå¤–éƒ¨æ—¶é’Ÿï¼Œå¯æŽ¥çŸ³è‹±/é™¶ç“·è°æŒ¯å™¨ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æŽ¥å¤–éƒ¨æ—¶é’Ÿæºï¼Œé¢‘çŽ‡èŒƒå›´ä¸º4MHz~16MHzã€‚ LSIæ˜¯ä½Žé€Ÿå†…éƒ¨æ—¶é’Ÿï¼ŒRCæŒ¯è¡å™¨ï¼Œé¢‘çŽ‡ä¸º40kHzï¼Œæä¾›ä½ŽåŠŸè€—æ—¶é’Ÿã€‚WDG LSEæ˜¯ä½Žé€Ÿå¤–éƒ¨æ—¶é’Ÿï¼ŒæŽ¥é¢‘çŽ‡ä¸º32.768kHzçš„çŸ³è‹±æ™¶ä½“ã€‚RTC PLLä¸ºé”ç›¸çŽ¯å€é¢‘è¾“å‡ºï¼Œå…¶æ—¶é’Ÿè¾“å…¥æºå¯é€‰æ‹©ä¸ºHSI/2ã€HSEæˆ–è€…HSE/2å€é¢‘å¯é€‰æ‹©ä¸º2~16å€ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å…¶è¾“å‡ºé¢‘çŽ‡æœ€å¤§ä¸å¾—è¶…è¿‡72MHzã€‚ ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¶é’ŸSYSCLKå¯æ¥æºäºŽä¸‰ä¸ªæ—¶é’Ÿæºï¼š HSIæŒ¯è¡å™¨æ—¶é’Ÿ HSEæŒ¯è¡å™¨æ—¶é’Ÿ PLLæ—¶é’Ÿ STM32å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é’Ÿä¿¡å·è¾“å‡ºåˆ°MCOè„š(PA8)ä¸Šï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©ä¸ºPLLè¾“å‡ºçš„2åˆ†é¢‘ã€HSIã€HSEã€æˆ–è€…ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¶é’Ÿã€‚ ä»»ä½•ä¸€ä¸ªå¤–è®¾åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå¿…é¡»é¦–å…ˆä½¿èƒ½å…¶ç›¸åº”çš„æ—¶é’Ÿã€‚ å‡ ä¸ªé‡è¦çš„æ—¶é’Ÿï¼š SYSCLK(ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¶é’Ÿ) : AHBæ€»çº¿æ—¶é’Ÿ APB1æ€»çº¿æ—¶é’Ÿ(ä½Žé€Ÿ): é€Ÿåº¦æœ€é«˜36MHz APB2æ€»çº¿æ—¶é’Ÿ(é«˜é€Ÿ): é€Ÿåº¦æœ€é«˜72MHz PLLæ—¶é’Ÿ RCCç›¸å…³é…ç½®å¯„å­˜å™¨12345678910111213typedef struct{ __IO uint32_t CR; //HSI,HSE,CSS,PLLç­‰çš„ä½¿èƒ½å’Œå°±ç»ªæ ‡å¿—ä½ __IO uint32_t CFGR; //PLLç­‰çš„æ—¶é’Ÿæºé€‰æ‹©ï¼Œåˆ†é¢‘ç³»æ•°è®¾å®š __IO uint32_t CIR; // æ¸…é™¤/ä½¿èƒ½ æ—¶é’Ÿå°±ç»ªä¸­æ–­ __IO uint32_t APB2RSTR; //APB2çº¿ä¸Šå¤–è®¾å¤ä½å¯„å­˜å™¨ __IO uint32_t APB1RSTR; //APB1çº¿ä¸Šå¤–è®¾å¤ä½å¯„å­˜å™¨ __IO uint32_t AHBENR; //DMAï¼ŒSDIOç­‰æ—¶é’Ÿä½¿èƒ½ __IO uint32_t APB2ENR; //APB2çº¿ä¸Šå¤–è®¾æ—¶é’Ÿä½¿èƒ½ __IO uint32_t APB1ENR; //APB1çº¿ä¸Šå¤–è®¾æ—¶é’Ÿä½¿èƒ½ __IO uint32_t BDCR; //å¤‡ä»½åŸŸæŽ§åˆ¶å¯„å­˜å™¨ __IO uint32_t CSR; //æŽ§åˆ¶çŠ¶æ€å¯„å­˜å™¨} RCC_TypeDef; SystemInitæºä»£ç 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273void SystemInit (void){ /* Reset the RCC clock configuration to the default reset state(for debug purpose) */ /* Set HSION bit */ RCC->CR |= (uint32_t)0x00000001; //æˆ–ç­‰äºŽï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å°†æœ€ä½Žä½è®¾ç½®ä¸º1ï¼Œå…¶å®ƒä½ä¸å˜ //å°†æœ€ä½Žä½è®¾ç½®ä¸º1ï¼ŒHSIONï¼šå†…éƒ¨é«˜é€Ÿæ—¶é’Ÿä½¿èƒ½ /* Reset SW, HPRE, PPRE1, PPRE2, ADCPRE and MCO bits */#ifndef STM32F10X_CL RCC->CFGR &= (uint32_t)0xF8FF0000; //å¹¶æœªå®šä¹‰STM32F10X_CL#else RCC->CFGR &= (uint32_t)0xF0FF0000; //å°†0-15ä½ç½®é›¶ï¼Œå°†24-27ç½®é›¶ //æŸ¥è¡¨å¯çŸ¥ï¼Œä½Žå››ä½ä¸ºé›¶ç›®çš„æ˜¯ä½¿SW, HPRE, PPRE1, PPRE2, ADCPRE, MCOå‡ ä¸ªå¯„å­˜å™¨å¤ä½ã€‚#endif /* STM32F10X_CL */ /* Reset HSEON, CSSON and PLLON bits */ RCC->CR &= (uint32_t)0xFEF6FFFF; //å°†16-19ä½ä¸Ž0110è¿ç®—ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯16,19ä½ç½®é›¶ //å°†24-27ä½ä¸Ž1110è¿ç®—ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯24ä½ç½®é›¶ //æŸ¥è¡¨å¯çŸ¥ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯å°†HSEON, CSSON and PLLONå‡ ä¸ªå¯„å­˜å™¨å¤ä½ /* Reset HSEBYP bit */ RCC->CR &= (uint32_t)0xFFFBFFFF; //16-19ä½ä¸ºBï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯1011 //ä¸Žè¿ç®—ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å°†18ä½ç½®é›¶ //æŸ¥è¡¨å¯çŸ¥ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯å°†HSEBYPå¤ä½ /* Reset PLLSRC, PLLXTPRE, PLLMUL and USBPRE/OTGFSPRE bits */ RCC->CFGR &= (uint32_t)0xFF80FFFF; //16-19ä½ä¸ºä¸Žè¿ç®—0000 //20-23ä½ä¸ºä¸Žè¿ç®—1000 //ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å°†16-19ä½ç½®é›¶ï¼Œ20-23ä½ç½®é›¶ //æŸ¥è¡¨å¯çŸ¥ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯å°†PLLSRC, PLLXTPRE, PLLMUL and USBPRE/OTGFSPRE å¤ä½#ifdef STM32F10X_CL //å¹¶æœªå®šä¹‰ /* Reset PLL2ON and PLL3ON bits */ RCC->CR &= (uint32_t)0xEBFFFFFF; /* Disable all interrupts and clear pending bits */ RCC->CIR = 0x00FF0000; /* Reset CFGR2 register */ RCC->CFGR2 = 0x00000000;#elif defined (STM32F10X_LD_VL) || defined (STM32F10X_MD_VL) || (defined STM32F10X_HD_VL) /* Disable all interrupts and clear pending bits */ RCC->CIR = 0x009F0000; /* Reset CFGR2 register */ RCC->CFGR2 = 0x00000000; #else /* Disable all interrupts and clear pending bits */ RCC->CIR = 0x009F0000;#endif /* STM32F10X_CL */ #if defined (STM32F10X_HD) || (defined STM32F10X_XL) || (defined STM32F10X_HD_VL) //å®šä¹‰äº†STM32F10X_HD #ifdef DATA_IN_ExtSRAM SystemInit_ExtMemCtl(); #endif /* DATA_IN_ExtSRAM */#endif /* Configure the System clock frequency, HCLK, PCLK2 and PCLK1 prescalers */ /* Configure the Flash Latency cycles and enable prefetch buffer */ SetSysClock();#ifdef VECT_TAB_SRAM SCB->VTOR = SRAM_BASE | VECT_TAB_OFFSET; /* Vector Table Relocation in Internal SRAM. */#else SCB->VTOR = FLASH_BASE | VECT_TAB_OFFSET; /* Vector Table Relocation in Internal FLASH. */#endif } 12345678910111213141516static void SetSysClock(void){#ifdef SYSCLK_FREQ_HSE SetSysClockToHSE();#elif defined SYSCLK_FREQ_24MHz SetSysClockTo24();#elif defined SYSCLK_FREQ_36MHz SetSysClockTo36();#elif defined SYSCLK_FREQ_48MHz SetSysClockTo48();#elif defined SYSCLK_FREQ_56MHz SetSysClockTo56(); #elif defined SYSCLK_FREQ_72MHz SetSysClockTo72();#endif} 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586878889909192939495static void SetSysClockTo72(void){ __IO uint32_t StartUpCounter = 0, HSEStatus = 0; /* SYSCLK, HCLK, PCLK2 and PCLK1 configuration ---------------------------*/ /* Enable HSE */ RCC->CR |= ((uint32_t)RCC_CR_HSEON); /* Wait till HSE is ready and if Time out is reached exit */ do { HSEStatus = RCC->CR & RCC_CR_HSERDY; StartUpCounter++; } while((HSEStatus == 0) && (StartUpCounter != HSE_STARTUP_TIMEOUT)); if ((RCC->CR & RCC_CR_HSERDY) != RESET) { HSEStatus = (uint32_t)0x01; } else { HSEStatus = (uint32_t)0x00; } if (HSEStatus == (uint32_t)0x01) { /* Enable Prefetch Buffer */ FLASH->ACR |= FLASH_ACR_PRFTBE; /* Flash 2 wait state */ FLASH->ACR &= (uint32_t)((uint32_t)~FLASH_ACR_LATENCY); FLASH->ACR |= (uint32_t)FLASH_ACR_LATENCY_2; /* HCLK = SYSCLK */ RCC->CFGR |= (uint32_t)RCC_CFGR_HPRE_DIV1; /* PCLK2 = HCLK */ RCC->CFGR |= (uint32_t)RCC_CFGR_PPRE2_DIV1; /* PCLK1 = HCLK */ RCC->CFGR |= (uint32_t)RCC_CFGR_PPRE1_DIV2;#ifdef STM32F10X_CL /* Configure PLLs ------------------------------------------------------*/ /* PLL2 configuration: PLL2CLK = (HSE / 5) * 8 = 40 MHz */ /* PREDIV1 configuration: PREDIV1CLK = PLL2 / 5 = 8 MHz */ RCC->CFGR2 &= (uint32_t)~(RCC_CFGR2_PREDIV2 | RCC_CFGR2_PLL2MUL | RCC_CFGR2_PREDIV1 | RCC_CFGR2_PREDIV1SRC); RCC->CFGR2 |= (uint32_t)(RCC_CFGR2_PREDIV2_DIV5 | RCC_CFGR2_PLL2MUL8 | RCC_CFGR2_PREDIV1SRC_PLL2 | RCC_CFGR2_PREDIV1_DIV5); /* Enable PLL2 */ RCC->CR |= RCC_CR_PLL2ON; /* Wait till PLL2 is ready */ while((RCC->CR & RCC_CR_PLL2RDY) == 0) { } /* PLL configuration: PLLCLK = PREDIV1 * 9 = 72 MHz */ RCC->CFGR &= (uint32_t)~(RCC_CFGR_PLLXTPRE | RCC_CFGR_PLLSRC | RCC_CFGR_PLLMULL); RCC->CFGR |= (uint32_t)(RCC_CFGR_PLLXTPRE_PREDIV1 | RCC_CFGR_PLLSRC_PREDIV1 | RCC_CFGR_PLLMULL9); #else /* PLL configuration: PLLCLK = HSE * 9 = 72 MHz */ RCC->CFGR &= (uint32_t)((uint32_t)~(RCC_CFGR_PLLSRC | RCC_CFGR_PLLXTPRE | RCC_CFGR_PLLMULL)); RCC->CFGR |= (uint32_t)(RCC_CFGR_PLLSRC_HSE | RCC_CFGR_PLLMULL9);#endif /* STM32F10X_CL */ /* Enable PLL */ RCC->CR |= RCC_CR_PLLON; /* Wait till PLL is ready */ while((RCC->CR & RCC_CR_PLLRDY) == 0) { } /* Select PLL as system clock source */ RCC->CFGR &= (uint32_t)((uint32_t)~(RCC_CFGR_SW)); RCC->CFGR |= (uint32_t)RCC_CFGR_SW_PLL; /* Wait till PLL is used as system clock source */ while ((RCC->CFGR & (uint32_t)RCC_CFGR_SWS) != (uint32_t)0x08) { } } else { /* If HSE fails to start-up, the application will have wrong clock configuration. User can add here some code to deal with this error */ }}#endif
